text_block_list.text:
—— It's summer training camp, and the horsegirls of Tracen 
Academy, including Symboli Rudolf, are staying at a seaside 
facility, fully immersed in their training.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Phew… I believe that wraps up this part.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But remember it's only the first day, we shouldn't push 
ourselves too hard. Let's make sure to warm up properly.
choice_data_list:
How about we take a break 
and do something fun?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hahah, you always come up with interesting ideas. 
Sure, let's take a breather.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Overexerting ourselves is never a good idea. There's a 
beachside restaurant nearby, let us grab lunch there.

Some time after having had lunch with Symboli Rudolf 
and completing the day's training…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you, Trainer. You're quite dedicated, 
working even during your free time.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Just taking a leisurely stroll and keeping an eye out. 
Well, to put it simply, I've got nothing to do.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Having free time can be enjoyable, but…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Wh… What in the world was that scream…!?
choice_data_list: It sounds like something might be wrong!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: We should go check it out! Hopefully it's not a real emergency!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm hearing screams from all directions! 
What on earth is happening…!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Huff… huff… The last scream came from around here……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I'm sure of it. I heard it only a moment ago.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Please, let everyone be safe…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Huh… Whoa!? P-President……!? We're so sorry! 
We mistook you for one of our classmates…!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
I-I-I'm so sorry! I didn't expect the Student Council 
President to get involved in the Haunted Challenge! 
I don't even know how to apologize……!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haunted Challenge…? So, there was 
no real danger to you all, then?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: No……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hahahah! So that's what's been happening! 
I guess I ended up giving you all quite a scare!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Uhm… President Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hahahah… Well, as long as you're all 
having fun, I'm genuinely pleased.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for interrupting. Please, continue as if I wasn't here.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? Hey, what's wrong? 
You all look a bit stunned…
choice_data_list: I think they thought you'd be mad at them.
I think they thought you'd be mad at them.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Why would I be angry? They've done nothing wrong. After all, 
this is their free time. What's there to be upset about?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
We are all students. There's more to it than races 
and training; the days we spend with friends will 
become important memories for our future.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Besides, a day like this won't come again. It's a precious 
night during our summer camp, so it's only natural to want 
to create enjoyable memories while we have the chance.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The same goes for me…… Heheh, I'd be lying if I said 
I weren't a little more excited than usual.
choice_data_list: Since we're here, why don't you join them?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: What!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hahah. Now, now, Trainer. That would probably bother them.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Don't you worry, girls. The training camp is long. 
Enjoy tonight to the fullest and recharge your spirits ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: …… Oh, um, President Rudolf!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
If you're okay with it… Would you… like to 
join us for the Haunted Challenge…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …… Are you sure?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Y-yes! If it's not too much trouble!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It is no trouble at all. Heheh… well then, 
I'll gladly accept your offer!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— Alright, class A, please report in.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am! Everyone's in position and ready to go!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. Class B, check for any 
danger zones and get to the site.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Once you find a blind spot, hide yourselves. 
Afterward… you know what to do, right?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Yes! We're going to surprise them at the perfect time!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Excellent. Good luck to you both.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Roger that, president!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh? What are you saying? 
This is all to make it the best event possible.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Showing something half-baked would be unfair to the 
participants, wouldn't it? With everyone coordinated, 
we'll create an unparalleled sense of terror.
choice_data_list: You look like you're enjoying yourself.
You look like you're enjoying yourself.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Heheh, indeed… I've never had a training 
camp that was this exciting.

The following day, the students were buzzing about how the 
"Haunted Challenge" had been even scarier and more 
enjoyable than in previous years.
